tool_description: An API used to access data about search trends on Google based on specific keywords, time range, and location.
name: Google Trends
title: Google Trends

api_list.name: trendings
api_list.description: The endpoint used to display some of the trending search keywords on Google in a specific region and on a specific date.

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: To display trend data for a specific date

required_parameters.name: region_code
required_parameters.description:
The region_code parameter is used to display data only for the specified region.
Example: **GB**, **ID**, **US**, etc.
To view the list of supported regions, please check the **/regions** endpoint.

api_list.name: regions
api_list.description: The endpoint to retrieve a list of supported regions
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://google-trends8.p.rapidapi.com/regions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "google-trends8.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://google-trends8.p.rapidapi.com/regions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "google-trends8.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
